properties.name: bachelor.iam.enable-user-access-control
properties.description: 是否对当前登录用户鉴权

properties.name: bachelor.iam.enable-user-identify
properties.description: 是否获取当前用户信息

properties.name: bachelor.iam.exclude-path-patterns
properties.description: 用户拦截器和访问控制拦截器要拦截的地址

properties.name: bachelor.iam.private-key-file
properties.description: 用于token加密的私钥文件地址
